body: Wael Ghonim shared this video through Twitter:  "Thats the real face of Egypt. Young Egyptians connect a mosque and a church with the Egyptian flag."
original_body: Wael Ghonim shared this video through Twitter:  "Thats the real face of Egypt. Young Egyptians connect a mosque and a church with the Egyptian flag."
title: Egypt: Flag Unites Mosque and Church
